txt.en: 'Sorry, I can't help you make horseshoes at the moment. A few new orders just came in.'

'Ah you need some horseshoes made? Sure, I can make those for you. Do me a favour, and grab the items I need while I put the finishing touches on this item.\n\n'I'll need you to find me an old horseshoe as a template for scale of the new ones, some scrap metal and a few crates of nails.'
Worse for Wear
'These are just what I needed to make the horseshoes. Give me a moment and I'll have these for you.'
'I'm helping Flint here with his new order. You'll need to find another blacksmith to help you with these horseshoes. You may want to try Matt over there.'
You found a blacksmith to help make horseshoes

'Thank you for taking the time to head into Bree-town and seeing this request through. The horse will appreciate this set of shoes! The stable-master is the only one here trained in replacing shoes, so I'll give these to him right away.'
You found an old horseshoe

'Thank you for finding someone to make these horseshoes and seeing it through! The horse will hopefully appreciate the protection these will offer him. I'll tell the stable-master we have them so he can put them on, as he's an expert in that sort of thing.'
Obtained crates of nails ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A blacksmith in Bree-town should be able to help us make a new set of horseshoes.
Obtained scrap metal ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The items needed by the blacksmith to forge new horseshoes can be found around the forge area.
Gave the 4 horseshoes to the Stable-helper.
Matt Haywood can be found at his forge near the Western gate of Bree-town, and is ready to help make the horseshoes.
The stable-helper in Combe will be happy to receive the horseshoes for the newly arrived horse.
The Stable-helper in Combe will be happy to receive the horseshoes for the newly arrived horse.
Find a blacksmith in Bree-town to help you
Find an old horseshoe
Obtain crates of nails ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Obtain scrap metal ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the items to Matt Haywood in Bree-town
Bring the horseshoes to the stable-helper in Combe
Bring the horseshoes to the Stable-helper in Combe
The stable-helper found out the horse needs a set of horseshoes made, and asked you to look into having the blacksmiths of Bree help make some.

'The horse's stall looks satisfactory for the time being, but it would seem this horse arrived with no horseshoes. I managed to check the hooves without getting kicked, and they're doing fine for now. Soon, though, he will need a set of shoes made. Please head to Bree-town and talk to the blacksmiths to see if one is available to make a set of horseshoes for us.'
